text: Yahud-o-nasaara kehtay hain kay hum Allah kay betay aur uss kay dost hain aap keh dijiye kay phir tumhen tumharay gunahon kay baees Allah kiyon saza deta hai? Nahi bulkay tum bhi uss ki makhlooq mein say aik insan ho woh jisay chahata hai bakhsh deta hai aur jisay chahata hai azab kerta hai zamin-o-aasman aur inn kay darmiyan ki her cheez Allah Taalaa ki milkiyat hai aur ussi ki taraf lotna hai
